title: Listen to TV on the Radio’s Tunde Adebimpe’s New Song “God Knows”
description: The latest single from forthcoming solo debut Thee Black Boltz
author: Eric Torres
excerpt: The latest single from forthcoming solo debut Thee Black Boltz
text: The latest single from forthcoming solo debut Thee Black BoltzTunde Adebimpe has shared a new song. “God Knows” is the latest single from the TV on the Radio frontman’s forthcoming debut solo album. Thee Black Boltz, produced by Adebimpe and Wilder Zoby and executive produced by Zoby, arrives April 18 via Sub Pop. Check it out below.“God Knows” is the third single released in anticipation of Thee Black Boltz. It joins the previously released “Magnetic” and “Drop.” Speaking about the new song in a press release, Adebimpe added, “Breaking up is hard to down dooby doo down do.”Adebimpe’s new album comes in the wake of TV on the Radio reissuing its debut album, Desperate Youth, Bloodthirsty Babes, alongside a coinciding reunion tour late last year.
html:
The latest single from forthcoming solo debut Thee Black Boltz

Tunde Adebimpe has shared a new song. “God Knows” is the latest single from the TV on the Radio frontman’s forthcoming debut solo album. Thee Black Boltz, produced by Adebimpe and Wilder Zoby and executive produced by Zoby, arrives April 18 via Sub Pop. Check it out below.

“God Knows” is the third single released in anticipation of Thee Black Boltz. It joins the previously released “Magnetic” and “Drop.” Speaking about the new song in a press release, Adebimpe added, “Breaking up is hard to down dooby doo down do.”

Adebimpe’s new album comes in the wake of TV on the Radio reissuing its debut album, Desperate Youth, Bloodthirsty Babes, alongside a coinciding reunion tour late last year.
